head.title: Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files with {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to rearrange pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily modify PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications with flexible document manipulation features. Reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files to streamline content structure.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing library that supports 50+ file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. Integrate it into your applications to merge, split, extract, rearrange, swap, and remove pages from various document types.

more_features.title: Enhanced document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a robust set of tools to efficiently manage and manipulate documents in over 50 formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple document formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio files, images, and archives. Fine-tune the output with customization options.

feature_2.title: Modify document layout
feature_2.content: Rearrange content by swapping, reordering, or removing pages to improve document structure.

feature_3.title: Change page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape mode as needed.

feature_4.title: Extract specific pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract specific pages or page ranges to create new documents.

formats.title: Reorder pages in various file types
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports more than 50 formats, enabling precise document modifications.

operations.title: Core functionalities
operations.description: Discover the essential features of our document processing library.

examples.comment_2: Specify the pages to be swapped
examples.comment_4: Save the modified file to a new location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) simplifies page reordering in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, giving you full control over content organization. Integrate seamless document processing into your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Define the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Choose the pages to be swapped or reordered.
content.step_3: Use the appropriate method to modify the document.
content.step_4: Save the updated file to the preferred location.

code_1.title: Swap the first and last pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to swap pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file with just a few simple steps.

code_1.comment_3: Define swap settings with page numbers
